Class PlayingStrategyHuman

    • controller.PlayingStrategyHuman
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlayingStrategy

    public class PlayingStrategyHuman
extends Object
implements PlayingStrategy
    The strategy makes the human player choose the move and place the tiles and castles on the game board.
